text: Carpool Karaoke is the signature bit from James Corden ’ s Late Late Show, and the likes of everyone from Bruno Mars, to Stevie Wonder, to then - First Lady Michelle Obama have joined him for ride - along sing - alongs. But apparently one star found the prospect of participating so off - putting that he “ bolted ” from the set. During a Late Late Show segment with Steven Tyler, Corden admitted that ‘ 80s rock icon Bryan Adams abandoned a Carpool Karaoke taping, apparently after learning that other musicians would be a part of it. Still, Corden made sure to note that the incident did nothing to dampen his affection for Adams and his music. What happened was, for the anniversary of Back to the Future, we were gon na do a sort of, “ Best of the ’ 80s ”
